data.title: R&B Singer and Actress Jill Scott Is Pregnant
data.meta_description:
R&B Singer and Actress Jill Scott Is Pregnant

 				 By Lisa Ingrassia
  Originally posted Friday January 09, 2009 07:25 PM EST
  			 				Jill Scott Photo...
data.text:
By Lisa Ingrassia

Originally posted Friday January 09, 2009 07:25 PM EST

Jill Scott Photo by: Joe Kohen / WireImage Jill Scott is pregnant with her first child, the R&B singer and actress revealed to reporters at the Television Critics Association conference in Los Angeles on Friday.

Promoting her new HBO series The No. 1 Ladies' Detective Agency, based on the popular novels by Alexander McCall Smith, Scott said she discovered that she was pregnant just before leaving for Botswana where she filmed the show.

"The first trimester I spent in Botswana," said the star, who is due April 25. "That was one of the biggest challenges of my life. First trimester! You're sick every morning. It was seven hours time difference, the heat, the bugs, the 14 hour days."

Still, the actress, who is engaged to drummer Lil' John Roberts, says she's glad she went through with the plans to film. "My doctors gave me a clean bill of health and said you can do this, so I did it."

Scott, 36, is a three-time Grammy Award winner and star of the 2007 Tyler Perry film Why Did I Get Married? http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20251479,00.html

it was yesterday, lol. Celeb's move fast. so many fall in and out of love so darn fast u can't keep up.

Really though, having babies are a precious thing, especially when you are ready and are not going at it alone.

My congrats to mom to be and dad to be.
